Topic.Title: Creating a New Inventory Side Panel

Posts.EditableText: Is there a way to create a custom side panel for a secondary inventory? For instance, if I wanted to create a special inventory for key items only?
Posts.HTML: Is there a way to create a custom side panel for a secondary inventory? For instance, if I wanted to create a special inventory for key items only?

Posts.EditableText:
The Pixie has this library on GitHub that might be what you're looking for:

https://github.com/ThePix/quest/wiki/Library:-Second-inventory
